attributes.action: stop wasting parliamentary time and money introducing new legislation and start making perfectly adequate existing legislation work through the police and courts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Knee jerk legislation is generally poor legislation.The government should stop introducing eye catching legislation and make existing statute work properly.The idea to outlaw membership of gangs being typical of this type of headline grabbing. I predict it will be impossible to charge and convict people of this 'crime'.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
